title: Style login role dropdown/select options with yellow background

requirements.summary: Style the SELECT SYSTEM ROLE dropdown options with yellow (#FFD700) background and black text to match the yellow/gold theme of other form elements on the Login page
acceptanceCriteria: The SELECT SYSTEM ROLE dropdown's visible option items (Administrator, Librarian, Faculty Member, Student Representative, and the placeholder 'Identify your role') display with a #FFD700 yellow background and black text when the dropdown is open.
The closed/selected state of the dropdown also shows yellow background with black text, consistent with other form inputs on the Login page.
No other styling on the Login page is altered by this change.

file_operations.description: Update the SELECT SYSTEM ROLE dropdown styling to apply yellow (#FFD700) background and black text to all option elements and the select element itself. Add inline styles or Tailwind classes to ensure both the closed/selected state and the open options list display with the yellow background. Ensure the styling matches the existing yellow/gold theme already present on other form inputs without altering any other page elements or layout.
